# Only add subdirectories if they contain CMakeLists.txt files
if(EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tc_3rdparty/CMakeLists.txt")
    add_subdirectory(tc_3rdparty)
endif()
#if(EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tc_capture_new/CMakeLists.txt")
#    add_subdirectory(tc_capture_new)
#endif()

    add_subdirectory(tc_encoder_new)
endif()

    add_subdirectory(tc_message_new)
endif()

    add_subdirectory(tc_common_new)
endif()

    add_subdirectory(tc_opus_codec_new)
endif()
if(EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tc_steam_manager_new/CMakeLists.txt")
    add_subdirectory(tc_steam_manager_new)
endif()
if(EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tc_controller/CMakeLists.txt")
    add_subdirectory(tc_controller)
endif()

    add_subdirectory(tc_client_sdk_new)
endif()

    add_subdirectory(tc_qt_widget)
endif()

    add_subdirectory(tc_relay_client)

    add_subdirectory(tc_webrtc_client)
endif()

    add_subdirectory(tc_account_sdk)
